Package net.getnova.backend.tests

Class RefectionUtils

java.lang.Object
net.getnova.backend.tests.RefectionUtils
public final class RefectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Some reflection utils for example to set the value of a private field.

  • Method Details

    • newInstance

      public static <T> T newInstance​(java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz, java.lang.Class<?>[] paramTypes, java.lang.Object[] params) throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
      Creates a new instance of e.g a private constructor.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the class
      Parameters:
      clazz - the Class-Type of the object to be created
      paramTypes - the parameter types of the constructor
      params - the parameter values of the constructor
      Returns:
      an instance of the class
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - is not normally thrown
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the number of actual and formal parameters differ; if an unwrapping conversion for primitive arguments fails; or if, after possible unwrapping, a parameter value cannot be converted to the corresponding formal parameter type by a method invocation conversion; if this constructor pertains to an enum type
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if the class that declares the underlying constructor represents an abstract class
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if a matching constructor is not found

    • checkPrivateUnsupportedOperationConstructor

      public static boolean checkPrivateUnsupportedOperationConstructor​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz) throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.InstantiationException
      Checks for a private constructor witch trows an UnsupportedOperationException.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class of the constructor
      Returns:
      a boolean if a private constructor witch throw an UnsupportedOperationException is found
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - is not normally thrown
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if the class that declares the underlying constructor represents an abstract class
      See Also:
      newInstance(Class, Class[], Object[])

    • getFieldValue

      public static java.lang.Object getFieldValue​(java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String fieldName) throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      This method returns the value of an not normally accessible field.
      Parameters:
      object - the object witch contains the value with the field
      fieldName - the name of the field
      Returns:
      the value of the specified field of the specified object
      Throws:
      java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if a field with the specified name does not exist
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - is not normally thrown

    • steFieldValue

      public static void steFieldValue​(java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String fieldName, java.lang.Object value) throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      This method returns the value of an not normally accessible field.
      Parameters:
      object - the object witch contains the field
      fieldName - the name of the field
      value - the new value for the field
      Throws:
      java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if a field with the specified name does not exist
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - is not normally thrown
